revision:
{'versionrevisionDatedescription', "versionrevisionDatedescription5.02023年10月10日Microsoft is announcing the release of the fifth phase of Windows security updates to address this vulnerability. These updates remove support for the registry subkey KrbtgtFullPacSignature and remove support for Audit mode. Further, all service tickets without the new PAC signatures will now be denied authentication. Microsoft strongly recommends that customers install the October 2023 updates to be fully protected from this vulnerability, and review How to manage the Kerberos and Netlogon Protocol changes related to CVE-2022-37967 for further information. Customers whose Windows devices are configured to receive automatic updates do not need to take any further action, but should review the article to fully understand the impact of these updates.
4.12023年7月18日Removed the Security Hotpatch Update for the July 2023 revision as that package doesn't exist for this release cycle. You must install the Security Update to get the updated software.
4.02023年7月11日Microsoft is announcing the release of the fourth phase of Windows security updates to address this vulnerability. These updates remove the ability to set value 1 for the KrbtgtFullPacSignature subkey, and enable the Enforcement mode (Default) (KrbtgtFullPacSignature = 3) which can be overridden by an Administrator with an explicit Audit setting. Microsoft strongly recommends that customers install the July updates to be fully protected from this vulnerability, and review How to manage the Kerberos and Netlogon Protocol changes related to CVE-2022-37967 for further information. Customers whose Windows devices are configured to receive automatic updates do not need to take any further action.
3.02023年6月13日Microsoft is announcing the release of the third phase of Windows security updates to address this vulnerability. These updates remove the ability to disable PAC signature addition by setting the KrbtgtFullPacSignature subkey to a value of 0. Microsoft strongly recommends that customers install the June updates to be fully protected from this vulnerability, and review How to manage the Kerberos and Netlogon Protocol changes related to CVE-2022-37967 for further information. Customers whose Windows devices are configured to receive automatic updates do not need to take any further action.
2.02022年12月13日Microsoft is announcing the release of the second phase of Windows security updates to address this vulnerability. These updates make changes to the Kerberos protocol to audit Windows devices by moving Windows domain controllers to Audit mode. With this update, all devices will be in Audit mode by default. Microsoft strongly recommends that customers install the December updates to be fully protected from this vulnerability. Customers whose Windows devices are configured to receive automatic updates do not need to take any further action.
For more information see KB5020805: How to manage Kerberos protocol changes related to CVE-2022-37967.
1.02022年11月8日Information published."}

4.22023年11月14日随着 2023 年 11 月 14 日安全更新的发布，2023 年 8 月添加的审核变更现已在 Windows Server 2022 上可用。您不需要安装 MSI 或创建“建议的操作”的“步骤 3”中提到的策略。
4.12023年10月24日2023 年 10 月 17 日，Microsoft 发布了 Windows Server 2022 版本 23H2（服务器核心安装）。此版本包含适用于管理员的选项，以审核无法通过 Active Directory 域控制器上的事件利用 LDAP 通道绑定令牌的客户端计算机，并包含在目录服务事件日志中使用事件源 Microsoft-Windows-ActiveDirectory_DomainService 启用 CBT 事件 3074 和 3075 的功能。
4.02023年10月10日Microsoft 宣布 2023 年 10 月 10 日更新适用于 Windows Server 2022 和 Windows Server 2022（服务器核心安装），以使管理员审核无法在 Active Directory 域控制器上通过事件利用 LDAP 通道绑定令牌的客户端计算机。这些更新添加了在目录服务事件日志中使用事件源 Microsoft-Windows-ActiveDirectory_DomainService 启用 CBT 事件 3074 和 3075 的功能。
3.02023年8月8日Microsoft 宣布 2023 年 8 月 8 日更新适用于 Windows Server 2022 和 Windows Server 2022（服务器核心安装），以审核无法通过 Active Directory 域控制器上的事件利用 LDAP 通道绑定令牌的客户端计算机。这些更新添加了在目录服务事件日志中使用事件源 Microsoft-Windows-ActiveDirectory_DomainService 启用 CBT 事件 3074 和 3075 的功能。
2.02020年3月10日Windows 宣布，2020 年 3 月 10 日，安全更新将为管理员添加强化 Active Directory 域控制器上 LDAP 通道绑定配置的选项。这些选项是：1.“域控制器：LDAP 服务器通道绑定令牌要求”组策略。2.目录服务事件日志中具有事件源 Microsoft-Windows-ActiveDirectory_DomainService 的 CBT 签名事件 3039、3040 和 3041。提示   2020 年 3 月 10 日以及未来可预见的更新不会变更新增或现有域控制器上的 LDAP 签名或 LDAP 通道绑定策略或它们的注册表等效项。
1.42020年2月28日进行了以下修订：1.阐明了客户为强化 Active Directory 域控制器上 LDAP 通道绑定和 LDAP 签名的配置需采取的措施。2.在“参考”部分中，添加了KB4546509的链接：
https://support.microsoft.com/zh-cn/help/4546509 - 有关轻型目录访问协议更改的常见问题。3.更新了“常见问题”部分，以将客户带到 KB4546509。
